name: HEIST (itch) (Slymp)
description:
Description

Topdown 2D action game where you will play as a thief in a museum, trying to avoid guard patrols, CCTVs and lasers. Complete your heist before the time runs out, and without getting caught by the security.

Made for the Weekly Game Jam #125

Controls

  • WASD / Arrows : Movement
  • Escape / Space / Return : Restart

Find the object

Avoid the security

Credits

  • Audio : iamoneabe
  • Pixel Art : Aphrim & imonk
  • Code : Slymp
